140 // Return the number of bytes used by the collision shape
141 inline size_t ConvexMeshShape::getSizeInBytes() const {
142  return sizeof(ConvexMeshShape);
143 }
144 
145 // Return the scaling vector
146 inline const Vector3& ConvexMeshShape::getScaling() const {
147  return mScaling;
148 }
149 
150 // Return the local bounds of the shape in x, y and z directions
155 inline void ConvexMeshShape::getLocalBounds(Vector3& min, Vector3& max) const {
156  min = mMinBounds;
157  max = mMaxBounds;
158 }
159 
160 // Return the local inertia tensor of the collision shape.
163 
168 inline void ConvexMeshShape::computeLocalInertiaTensor(Matrix3x3& tensor, decimal mass) const {
169  decimal factor = (decimal(1.0) / decimal(3.0)) * mass;
170  Vector3 realExtent = decimal(0.5) * (mMaxBounds - mMinBounds);
171  assert(realExtent.x > 0 && realExtent.y > 0 && realExtent.z > 0);
172  decimal xSquare = realExtent.x * realExtent.x;
173  decimal ySquare = realExtent.y * realExtent.y;
174  decimal zSquare = realExtent.z * realExtent.z;
175  tensor.setAllValues(factor * (ySquare + zSquare), 0.0, 0.0,
176  0.0, factor * (xSquare + zSquare), 0.0,
177  0.0, 0.0, factor * (xSquare + ySquare));
178 }
179 
180 // Return the number of faces of the polyhedron
181 inline uint ConvexMeshShape::getNbFaces() const {
182  return mPolyhedronMesh->getHalfEdgeStructure().getNbFaces();
183 }
184 
185 // Return a given face of the polyhedron
186 inline const HalfEdgeStructure::Face& ConvexMeshShape::getFace(uint faceIndex) const {
187  assert(faceIndex < getNbFaces());
188  return mPolyhedronMesh->getHalfEdgeStructure().getFace(faceIndex);
189 }
190 
191 // Return the number of vertices of the polyhedron
192 inline uint ConvexMeshShape::getNbVertices() const {
193  return mPolyhedronMesh->getHalfEdgeStructure().getNbVertices();
194 }
195 
196 // Return a given vertex of the polyhedron
197 inline HalfEdgeStructure::Vertex ConvexMeshShape::getVertex(uint vertexIndex) const {
198  assert(vertexIndex < getNbVertices());
199  return mPolyhedronMesh->getHalfEdgeStructure().getVertex(vertexIndex);
200 }
201 
202 // Return the number of half-edges of the polyhedron
203 inline uint ConvexMeshShape::getNbHalfEdges() const {
204  return mPolyhedronMesh->getHalfEdgeStructure().getNbHalfEdges();
205 }
206 
207 // Return a given half-edge of the polyhedron
208 inline const HalfEdgeStructure::Edge& ConvexMeshShape::getHalfEdge(uint edgeIndex) const {
209  assert(edgeIndex < getNbHalfEdges());
210  return mPolyhedronMesh->getHalfEdgeStructure().getHalfEdge(edgeIndex);
211 }
212 
213 // Return the position of a given vertex
214 inline Vector3 ConvexMeshShape::getVertexPosition(uint vertexIndex) const {
215  assert(vertexIndex < getNbVertices());
216  return mPolyhedronMesh->getVertex(vertexIndex) * mScaling;
217 }
218 
219 // Return the normal vector of a given face of the polyhedron
220 inline Vector3 ConvexMeshShape::getFaceNormal(uint faceIndex) const {
221  assert(faceIndex < getNbFaces());
222  return mPolyhedronMesh->getFaceNormal(faceIndex);
223 }
224 
225 // Return the centroid of the polyhedron
226 inline Vector3 ConvexMeshShape::getCentroid() const {
227  return mPolyhedronMesh->getCentroid() * mScaling;
228 }
229 
230 }
231
